name: Mushrooms (andreastmusic)
description:
My first game ever! Quite silly but I am proud of it. Mainly a music composer, I decided to make a simple game and add some music and sfx as a demo reel. One thing led to another and this is the result.

It is a basic level and waves of mushrooms spawn from two locations. There are 5 waves and a boss wave, and it goes on and on. Every time the cycle repeats, enemies become more difficult to kill and give you more points.

Considering the fact that there are no items that fill your health bar, it is getting harder and harder pretty fast.

When you lose all your lives, game resets.
